title: Million Dollar Baked Chicken Breast - Delicious Family Favorite
promptIMG: Million Dollar Baked Chicken Breast, on plate, natural food photography, balanced sharp focus, zero blur throughout entire image, infinite depth of field, realistic food textures, modern kitchen background in sharp focus, natural lighting, kitchen countertop visible, even focus distribution, documentary food photography, natural sharpness --no blur, depth of field, bokeh, over-sharpening, artificial enhancement --quality 2 --raw --stylize 300
description: Indulge in this Million Dollar Baked Chicken Breast that promises to impress your family at dinner. Its rich flavors and tender texture make it a standout dish. Try it tonight and elevate your mealtime experience!
instructions: In a bowl, mix olive oil, garlic powder, onion powder, paprika, salt, and pepper.
Coat the chicken breasts with the mixture and place them in a baking dish.
Sprinkle Parmesan cheese on top of the chicken.
Bake for 25-30 minutes or until the chicken is cooked through and golden brown.
Garnish with fresh parsley before serving.
tips: For perfectly baked chicken, ensure the internal temperature reaches 165°F (75°C) and let it rest for a few minutes before slicing.

structured_content.content: This Million Dollar Baked Chicken Breast is a family favorite that combines simplicity with rich flavors. The tender chicken, topped with a crispy Parmesan crust, is sure to delight your taste buds and impress your loved ones.

note.label: Why You'll Love This Recipe
note.content:
• Quick and easy to make in under 45 minutes
  • Restaurant-quality flavors at home
  • Perfect for weeknight dinners or special occasions
  • Uses simple ingredients you likely have on hand
  • Great for meal prep and leftovers

structured_content.content: I remember the first time I made this dish for my family; their faces lit up with joy at the first bite. It's become a staple in our home, bringing everyone together around the dinner table.

• Main ingredient: Chicken breast is lean and cooks quickly, making it ideal for this recipe. Look for fresh, high-quality cuts.
  • Key seasonings/flavoring agents: Garlic and onion powders add depth, while paprika gives a slight smokiness.
  • Supporting ingredients: Parmesan cheese adds a rich, savory flavor and a crispy texture when baked.
  • Equipment needed: A baking dish and mixing bowl are essential for this recipe.

upload.context: Preparation of the chicken breast with seasonings in a bowl.

structured_content.content:
Preparation:
Preheat your oven to 375°F (190°C) and prepare your baking dish. Mix the seasoning blend in a bowl.
Cooking/Baking Process:
Coat the chicken with the seasoning mixture, place in the baking dish, and top with Parmesan. Bake until golden brown.
Finishing Touches:
Garnish with fresh parsley for a pop of color and flavor before serving.

upload.context: Cooking process of the chicken in the oven.

note.label: You Must Know
note.content:
• Ensure the chicken is fully cooked to an internal temperature of 165°F (75°C).
  • Avoid overcooking to keep the chicken juicy.
  • Look for a golden crust as a sign of doneness.
  • Store leftovers in an airtight container for up to 3 days.

structured_content.content: This dish holds a special place in my heart as it brings my family together, creating moments filled with laughter and love around the dinner table.
Consider adding herbs like thyme or rosemary for an aromatic twist, or a squeeze of lemon juice for brightness.
Serve with a side of roasted vegetables or a fresh salad for a complete meal. Pair with a glass of white wine for a delightful dinner experience.
For a gluten-free option, skip the breadcrumbs and use almond flour. You can also try marinating the chicken in yogurt for added tenderness.

upload.context: Final plated dish of Million Dollar Baked Chicken Breast.

note.label: Pro Tips
note.content:
• Brine the chicken in saltwater for extra juiciness.
  • Let the chicken rest after baking for better texture.
  • Use a meat thermometer for perfect doneness.
  • Plate beautifully with garnishes for an impressive presentation.

structured_content.content: Enjoy the satisfaction of creating this delicious dish that your family will love. Cooking can be a joyful experience, and this recipe is sure to bring smiles to your table!
